name: SHARPCopier
0:
”Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to copy”
”Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to scan to me”
”Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to make three copies with two sided”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sharp copier
des:
Copy and scan documents by a SHARP MFP.

To get started, first register your MFP with the following steps:
1. From the operation panel of your MFP, please start an application "MFP Voice App".
2. The app shows 6 digits one-time PIN number. e.g. 863489
3. Say to Alexa "Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to register device."
4. Alexa will ask you "To register the device, say PIN number." Say to Alexa "863489". (Replace 863489 with your PIN number)
5. Alexa will repeat the PIN number for confirmation. If it's correct, please say "Yes". If not, please say "No" and then say the correct PIN number again.
6. Alexa will say "Device successfully registered". Now you are ready to go.

Here are things you can do:

[Copy]
"Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to copy."
"Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to copy with 2-sided and monochrome."
"Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to make 3 copies."
"Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to make 7 copies with stapled."
"Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to make a copy with monochrome."

[Scan] (please login to your MFP before use)
"Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to scan document to me."
"Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to scan with 1-sided."
"Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to scan with 2-sided and monochrome(*)."

(*) Scanning Options
- Color Mode: Full Color / Monochrome
- File Format: PDF / Image / Searchable PDF
- Input Type: 1-sided / 2-sided

After you ask Alexa to scan, it will repeat the command and confirm. Please answer "Yes". If you want to change options for scanning, please answer "No" and indicate options again with the following commands. 

[Update Scanning Options]
 "Set image." 
 "Set 1-sided." 
 "Update color." 

If you want to unregister your MFP, please follow these steps:
 1. Say to Alexa "Alexa, ask SHARP Copier to unregister device." 
 2. Alexa will unregister your MFP.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
